nodes.text: The Hilltop was a structure on the Outer Rim desert world of Tatooine, in existence during the time of the Galactic Civil War. When looked at from above, it looked similar to the work of D.M. Skecher.

The Hilltop was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, players could complete a collection called "Panoramic Vistas." In this collection, players were given a clue as to how to find The Hilltop.
